name: River rumble
description:
. Created for Global Game Jam 2019 in about 48 hours.

A local multiplayer, split screen, real time strategy game. Build your home, make some friends, and then defend your home from the enemy team! Home is what you make of it, so in River Rumble you have the freedom to arrange your town however you like, build your crew, then attack and defend with micro and macro strategies. all you need to play is a keyboard or 2 controllers, and a friend. 

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/river-rumble

info:

use the joystick/a(or x if not xbox) or wasd/space arrowkeys/enter. joystick/wasd/arrowkeys moves your curser, and a/x/enter/space interacts with the highlighted tile.

place units next to a tree/other unit to work or fight. use wood to build houses and create more units. use wood to fix the bridge, and cross the bridge to take down your opponent!
